name: Plailect's Guide - Dark Style
description:
Those of us that lurk in dark rooms tend to prefer darker stylesheets, rather than bright ones.

This sheet tweaks the popular 3DS hacking guide by Plailect to fit this preference.

user.name: CheatFreak47
user.about: I make userstyles that usually make sites easier to use or make them easier on the eyes.

additional_info:
- new url
- plailect changed advertisers, he now uses Amazon Ads. So I tried to theme them. They were stubborn. The result is rather ugly but at least it's not eye gouging compared to the rest of the page.
- now themes the advertisement because <strike>plailect is cool about his ad choices</strike> 
- initial post
